Text: Upgrade the stock to 'add' (from 'reduce') with revised TP of Rs 1,350 (from Rs1,230) as we roll over to Sept-21 and raise target multiple to 38x (from 36x).
Cause: we roll over to Sept-21 and raise target multiple to 38x (from 36x).
Effect: Upgrade the stock to 'add' (from 'reduce') with revised TP of Rs 1,350 (from Rs1,230)
